title: Renovated Apartment in Historic Bldg 1 BR Close to Lowertown
map_address: 361 Bates Ave N near East 6th St
posting_body: ['Contact info:', '*Please send inquiries via e-mail through the link in this ad*', 'Renovated 1 Bedroom Apartment', 'in Historic Building', '361 Bates Ave #4, Saint Paul, MN 55106', '$995/mo', '* Available Now!', '*', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Year Built:', '1900', 'Sq Footage:', 'Appx 700 sqft.', 'Bedrooms:', '1 Bedroom', 'Bathrooms:', '1 Full Bath', '*** Air Conditioned ***', 'Lease Duration:', '12 month minimum', 'Deposit:', '$995', 'Pets Policy:', 'Sorry, this is a no pets building', 'Laundry:', 'Shared, in building.', 'Conveniently just steps from this apartment', 'Floor:', 'Lower Level', 'Property Type:', 'Fourplex', 'DESCRIPTION', 'Located in a vibrant neighborhood just steps from Metro State University, this historic building recently underwent a COMPLETE RENOVATION and was the recipient of a Heritage Preservation Award from the City of St Paul.', 'Also within quick walking distance are; Mississippi Market, Swede Hollow Cafe and Park, Coffee Shop, Yeorg Brewing and Saloon.', "Other popular destinations nerby: Minnesota Music Cafe, St Paul Brewery (formerly Flat Earth), Brunson's Pub, Tongue in Cheek Restaurant and much more!", 'The rejuvenated Lowertown area of St Paul bustles with a variety of new pubs and dining establishments and is also very close...', "There's lots to do in the area!", 'This unit has a newer kitchen and bath, windows, lighting and plumbing fixtures, appliances and more.', "You'll love the heated floors in the winter!", 'Unique architectural stylings include original structural wood beams.', 'Laundry is just steps from your apartment door.', 'During summer months, sip your morning coffee or an evening cocktail and greet neighbors while relaxing on the front porch.', 'Walk or ride your bike along the Bruce Vento Trail to catch a St Paul Saints (now the AAA affiliate of the Minnesota Twins!) game at CHS Field, or take in Music in the Park at Mears Park.', '...', "It's all here - what a great place to live!", 'Please send initial inquiries by email via the link provided on this page.', 'Thank you!', 'LEASE TERMS', '- Tenant pays only Electricity and Cable (if desired).', '- Owner pays for Heat, Gas, Trash, Sewer and Water.', '- Security Deposit is equal to one month rental fee', '- This is a No Smoking Unit', '- Sorry, No Pets', 'Features include; original hardwood floors, downtown St Paul views, shared front porch, completely updated mechanicals, new windows, lighting and plumbing fixtures, etc.', '* Sorry, this landlord does not participate in the Section 8 program.', '*', '* PLEASE review Eligibility Requirements below-', 'Thank you! *', 'We are a fair housing provider.', 'We do not discriminate against persons on the basis of race, color, creed, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, familial status, status with regard to public assistance, disability or any other protected status.', 'Each tenant 18 and older planning to reside at the property must fill out an application.', 'There is a $40 fee per applicant.', 'We will obtain a third-party credit check, landlord/rental reference check, eviction check, employment verification and criminal background check.', 'Eligibility:', 'Your application may be rejected for one or more of the following reasons:', '* Not being able to provide photo ID;', '* Not having verifiable, reliable and predictable monthly income of at least 2.5 times the monthly rent;', '* Having a prior eviction or Unlawful Detainer within the past 3 years;', '* Owing a debt to a former Landlord or utility company', '* Having a felony conviction for assault, arson, sex offense or certain other violent crimes within the past 10 years;', '* Having a felony conviction in the last 5 years for a drug offense or certain other non-violent crimes.', '* Having a Misdemeanor and Gross Misdemeanor with a date of sentencing within the past 3 years.', '* Providing false or misleading information or omitting material information from the application.', 'Contact info:', '* Please send all inquiries by e-mail via the link in this ad, Thank You! *', 'Dennis Kuchenmeister', 'RE/MAX Results', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Open Front Porch', 'Small Yard Area', 'Secured entry', 'Laundry in building', 'Cable-ready', 'Intercom system', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'Vintage building', 'Near transportation', 'Walk to Restaurants, Markets, Coffee Shop, Brewery', "Near Parks, St Paul's Lowertown and much more!", 'LEASE TERMS', 'Owner pays Heat, Gas, Water and Trash.', 'Tenant pays for electricity only (and cable/internet if desired).', 'Contact info:', '*Please send inquiries via e-mail* through the link in this ad.']
